system.effect:
Target: A Pokémon
Effect: The target learns a Move from its Egg or Tutor list (following the Tutoring Restrictions based on the target’s level) or any move on its level-up list learned at X Level or lower, where X is the target’s current Level plus the sum of your two highest Skill Ranks among this Features’s prerequisite Skills. Moves from the target’s level-up or those from the Tutor List marked with (N) count as if they were “natural” for organizational purposes.
prerequisites: Two of Charm Intimidate Intuition or Pokémon Education at Novice Rank
system.name: Surge of Spirit [CR]
